TopicTitle: Solar System and "record missions" gone. (New 1.0 Career)

Articles.Content:
Good Morning,

after coming back from the first orbital flight in a new 1.0 career I exited the ship with Valentina. She fell down a few meters to the desert ground (west of KSC) since I have no ladders yet. The moment she touched ground the whole solar system disappeared. I was able to go back to the KSC-Screen, but there was only bird chirping in space, no buildings, no Kerbin. After completely closing and relaunching the game I had do load my quicksave where she was still in space. So I landed again but now all the nice things like "Reach 2500 m/s" missions are gone and thus the chain of getting the "next level" of them seems to be broken. :'(

Greetings,

Arti
